# isaacyap.ai

> Isaac Yap — Software Developer & Digital Solutions Architect based in Singapore/Johor Bahru

## About

Isaac Yap builds websites, web apps, and digital systems for small-to-medium businesses in Singapore and Southeast Asia. Specialising in ordering systems, booking platforms, business landing pages, and full-stack web applications.

## Services

- **Starter Website** ($500 SGD): Landing page with WhatsApp/contact CTA, mobile-first design, SEO-ready
- **Growth Website** ($1,000-1,500 SGD): Booking system, Telegram/email notifications, admin dashboard
- **Scale Web App** ($3,000-5,000 SGD): Full web application with authentication, multi-module admin panel
- **Super App** ($5,000-15,000 SGD): Mobile app (React Native/Expo), real-time features, multi-user systems
- **Annual Maintenance** ($300-600 SGD/year): Monitoring, 1-hour emergency SLA, 2hrs changes/month

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, React Native (Expo)
- Backend: Supabase, Node.js, Vercel Edge Functions
- Deployment: Vercel, GitHub
- Integrations: Telegram bots, WhatsApp, email notifications, payment gateways

## Portfolio

- **TattByLyds** (tattbylyds.vercel.app): Tattoo booking platform with Bangkok guest work feature, Telegram notifications, admin panel
- **FabTheStretchLad** (fabthestretchlad.vercel.app): Stretch therapy booking site with Supabase backend
- **UB Live Scoring** (ub-live-scoring.vercel.app): Real-time MMA/combat sports scoring system
- **JMT Super App**: Gym management SaaS (in development)
- **Pocolane**: Social platform (pocolane.studio)

## Contact

- Website: https://isaacyap.ai
- Email: hello@isaacyap.ai
- Instagram: @isaacyap.ai
- Location: Johor Bahru, Malaysia / Singapore

## Background

Professional MMA referee with 500+ bouts (ONE Championship, Rebel FC, MIMMA). Muay Thai instructor. The discipline and zero-tolerance-for-errors mindset from combat sports carries directly into software delivery — 100% delivery rate, 4-6 week timelines.
